title: Sudan – Ceasefire (10.23.15) (Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Development of the French Republic) ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Development of the French Republic ) France welcomes the declaration by the Sudan Revolutionary Front on October 18 of a 6-month unilateral ceasefire in the regions of Darfur , South
